data.title: About Uriel
data.meta_description: About Uriel. Uriel Vega, a gospel/devotional/spiritual artist from San Diego, CA.
data.text:
Personal mission

"To create music with the sole purpose of inspiring and comforting the world"

Uriel Vega is a talented saxophonist who has been enchanting audiences around the world with his soulful sound for over two decades.

Born in Mexico City in 1985, Uriel discovered his passion for music at a young age and began playing the saxophone at the age of 10.

By the time he was 17, Uriel had already recorded his first solo album, which marked the beginning of an illustrious career in music.

Over the years, Uriel has released an impressive 22 solo records, each showcasing his exceptional talent and artistry.

His music has been streamed on over 100 million times on Youtube alone, a testament to his popularity and the enduring appeal of his music.

Uriel has traveled extensively, performing in some of the world's most iconic venues and sharing the stage with many mainstream and Christian artists.

Despite his success, Uriel remains grounded and committed to his ministry. He currently resides in Salt Lake City, Utah, with his wife Kenia Vega,

where he continues to record and perform music that touches the hearts and souls of people. Uriel's music is a reflection of his deep faith and his passion for the Lord.
